extDescription.message: An eye-dropper & color-picker tool that allows you to select color values from webpages.

closeAndExit.message: Close and Exit Color Pick Mode

buyRegisterTip.message: Click to Buy & Register a ColorPick License.

disablePickEveryTime.message: Do not start picking each time popup is clicked

bgPageUnavailable.message: Background Snapshot Not Responding - Please Refresh the Page and Try Again.

licenseExceeded.message: License may be in use on the maximum number of hosts.  License upgrade may resolve the issue... Launch upgrade webpage?

licenseComFirewall.message: Make sure your firewall is open on port 80 or contact your system administrator.

showndefaults.message: Please press save, now showing defaults.

loadsyncOptions.message: Sync Storage options have been loaded and saved.

pickEveryTime.message: Start picking colors each time popup is clicked

showPreviewInContent.message: Show zoom preview near cursor while picking

ShowRGBHSL.message: Also show Hex, RGB and/or HSL (configure above)

autocopyhex.message: Attempt to auto copy value to clipboard

hasAgreedToLicense.message: Has agreed to Terms of Use

usageStatistics.message: Gather Usage Statistics (See Terms of Use)

shareClors.message: Color of the Day Statistics (See Terms of Use)

supportColorInputs.message: Add eyedropper near input[type=color] fields on websites

iconIsPreview.message: Use icon badge square color preview

appleIcon.message: Use Apple Digital Color Meter logo

showPreviousClr.message: Show Split Color Preview with Previous Color

hideWatermark.message: Hide ColorPick watermark on webpage corner (registered only)

fetchSync.message: Fetch settings from Google Account Sync Storage

noSwatches.message: Click colors in color history to add them to a palette for saving and printing.

watermark_help.message: Watermark may be disabled from advanced options once you have registered the extension.

tips_0.message: Register ColorPick for the option to hide this message.

tips_1.message: Move your mouse over the web page to examine pixel color values. Click to the web page to pick!

tips_1_locked.message: Click the web page to unlock and examine color values again.

tips_2.message: Return to the ColorPick menu for fine adjustment options or to exit ColorPick.

tips_3.message: Chase this message for tips and more.

tips_4.message: Did you know? ColorPick Eyedropper is available for iPhone and Android!

tips_5.message: Your Ad Here - Contact via vidsb.com to Sponsor ColorPick.
